article:
I'm a middle school student. I think my life isn't really _ . Let me tell you _ it.
I go to school from Monday to Friday. I _ get up before 7:30 in the morning, because I always go to bed late at night. After getting up, I wash my face   and brush teeth.
I _ a healthy breakfast at 7:40. At 8:00, I walk to the bus stop. I take a _ to school. It takes _ 20 minutes to get there. School finishes at 14:30. When I get home, I do my _ and study until   17:00. After that, I _ my mother make dinner. We have dinner at 18:00. Then I always talk with my friends on the computer. We talk about many things. I go to bed at 22:30.
My school days are boring, _ the weekends are another   story. How is your life?
